pregnancy_status.baby_development: Body prepares for ovulation
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Track cycle, eat healthy, take prenatal vitamins (Folic Acid)

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Body prepares for ovulation
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Track cycle, eat healthy, take prenatal vitamins (Folic Acid)

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Poppy seed. Fertilization occurs, baby is a tiny ball of cells
Sesame seed. Implantation, placenta starts forming
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: May feel fatigue or spotting; take a pregnancy test

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Apple seed. Heart starts to beat, basic body systems form
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Eat iron-rich food, start gentle walks

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Lentil. Neural tube closes, arm/leg buds form
Blueberry. Brain grows fast, facial features start forming
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Rest well; eat small frequent meals

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Raspberry. Fingers/toes form, baby moves (you can't feel yet)
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Begin prenatal yoga; manage mood swings

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Green olive. Muscles forming, heart has 4 chambers
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Book your first prenatal visit if not done

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Prune. Vital organs formed, nails and hair begin
Fig. External genitals begin forming
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Manage food aversions; wear loose clothes

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Lime. Reflexes develop, baby moves hands/feet
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Time for NT scan; emotional changes normal

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Pea pod. Vocal cords form, organs mature
Lemon. Baby starts sucking thumb
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Focus on protein & iron; feel less nausea

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Apple. Baby can sense light
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Start moisturizing belly to avoid stretch marks

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Avocado. Facial expressions develop
Turnip. Fat builds up, skeleton hardens
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Stay active; avoid standing too long

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Bell pepper. Ears in place, may hear sounds
Mango. Vernix (protective coating) forms
Banana. Midway! Anatomy scan week
Carrot. Baby swallows amniotic fluid
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Manage backaches; support belt may help

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Coconut. Eyelashes/eyebrows visible
Grapefruit. Lungs develop, skin still wrinkled
Ear of corn. Viability begins (NICU possible)
Cauliflower. Baby's hands grasp, sense of balance
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Take breaks while walking; swelling may start

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Lettuce. Baby opens eyes, brain develops fast
Cucumber. Sleep/wake cycle starts
Eggplant. Brain activity, eyes blink
Butternut squash. Baby's bones harden, kicks stronger
Cabbage. Lungs and digestive system maturing
Pineapple. Sleep patterns form
Jicama. Baby stores fat, practices breathing
Celery bunch. Skull soft, brain continues to grow
Cantaloupe. Immune system develops
Honeydew melon. Baby's position shifts downward
Romaine lettuce. Baby “engages” into pelvis
Swiss chard. Full term; organs ready
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Watch for labor signs; rest often

pregnancy_status.baby_development: Leek. Baby gains weight rapidly
Mini watermelon. Lanugo gone, baby practices breathing
Pumpkin. Baby is ready to be born!
pregnancy_status.moms_experience: Go to hospital if labor starts
